body.content:
Projects
A few products I designed
About
Who I am
Hi there, my name's Soren. I'm the founder of Iverson, a full-service creative consultancy, and co-founder of Stompers, a social step-tracking game. My career started in high school when I worked as a motion designer. Since then I've worked with dozens of startups, Square, Cash App, Rocket, Duolingo, Coinbase, Meta, and more as a designer or creative "consultant".
I publish satirical product “ideas” daily (though I cut back to weekdays in 2025). Outside of work, I play bass for Dive Time and do a lil bit of investing.
Want to say hi? Have an unhinged idea? Contact me: [EMAIL REDACTED]
Work
A brief professional history
Book
Some of my writing and design
I wrote, designed, and published a lil coffee table book called Can you imagine? with over 365 of my satirical product ideas.
SOLD OUT
Designed in Figma. Built with Framer.
body.description: Designer based in Costa Mesa, CA
